rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -vfi
# temporary work-around, this has been fixed upstream sed -i 's@# include <asm/sigcontext.h>@@g' os_dep.c
export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -DNO_GETCONTEXT=1"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --localstatedir=/var/lib \ --enable-cplusplus \ --with-tags=CXX
